name: Dor dor
message: Happy birthday Dad! You're my favorite person in the whole world! I love and cherish you so much, and I'm glad we all get to celebrate you on this special day. I know you're going to rock this new age with grace and charm as always. I love you daddy❤. GOD BLESS YOUUUUU!

name: Rocky man
message: Happy Birthday Daddy❤️I pray God protects, guide, bless and provide for you AMEN.😼💕

name: Aunty Chi chi & Fam
message: Happy birthday Dad. Thank you for your continuous love, support, and kindness to all of us. We're grateful to have you in our lives, and we cherish every opportunity we get to celebrate you, even though we celebrate you every day. May this new age be filled with joy, blessings, and abundance in all things for you. Enjoy your day, Dad.

name: Mr B
message: Happy Birthday, Dad. You’ve always been my biggest example of strength, patience, and love. I’m so grateful for everything you’ve done — for the lessons, the laughs, and the steady way you’ve always been there. I hope today reminds you how deeply you’re loved and appreciated.
